value.title: StarCraft 2: AMAZING - HeroMarine's MASS BATTLECRUISER Rush!
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between HeroMarine (Terran) and trigger (Protoss). In this match played during HomeStory Cup 23, HeroMarine decides to Proxy a Starport and make one Battlecruiser a time. In the late game he makes a transition towards mass Tactical Nuke as well.  Support my work: https://patreon.com/lowkotv
